hadiths.text: This hadith is narrated to us on the authority of Muhammad b. 'Abdullah b. Numair, on the authority of Muhammad b. Bishr, on the authority of Abd Hayyan al-Taymi with the exception that in this narration (instead of the words (Iza Waladat al'amah rabbaha), the words are (Iza Waladat al'amah Ba'laha), i, e, when slave-girl gives birth to her master

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِيمَانُ مَا هُوَ وَبَيَانُ خِصَالِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What is Al-Iman (Faith)? Explaining Its Characteristics
